ruling: - If [[Cocoon of Evolution]] is Summoned or Set it is treated as a monster, if played as an Equip Spell Card it is treated as an Equip Spell Card as long as it remains on the field and could be destroyed with [[Mystical Space Typhoon]].  Once on the field it cannot be switched from monster to Spell Card or vice versa.  [[Cocoon of Evolution]] is not a Union Monster.
